comment.brief: Changes in state during the root frame are handled as bypass, with special exceptions.
comment.full: Changes in state during the root frame are handled as bypass, with special exceptions.

comment.brief: All changes are treated as normal and nothing is bypassed.
comment.full: All changes are treated as normal and nothing is bypassed.

comment.brief: Only changes during the rooting frame are handled as bypass, without special exceptions.
comment.full: Only changes during the rooting frame are handled as bypass, without special exceptions.

comment.brief:
Deprecated: 2017-07-21
For possible backwards compatibilty, like Standard but excludes the check for layout bypass.
This mode should not be used.
comment.full:
Deprecated: 2017-07-21
For possible backwards compatibilty, like Standard but excludes the check for layout bypass.
This mode should not be used.

comment.brief: Only changes during the rooting frame are handled as bypass, without special exceptions.
comment.full: Only changes during the rooting frame are handled as bypass, without special exceptions.
